bibl.title: To the Inscriptions of Labraunda.
bibl.note: Presents a number of observations and improvements to the original edition [J. CRAMPA, Labraunda. Swedish Excavations and Researches. III. The Greek Inscriptions (Lund - Stockholm, 1969-1972) Nos 1 and 1B-2; 3; 3B; 4; 5; 6(A); 6(B); 7; 8; 9; 10; 12; 42; 43; 44; 46; 47; 48; 53; 54; 61; 62; 88]. - Pp. 151-156: Appendix. Three Hellenistic Inscriptions from the City and Territory of Mylasa.
PIEJKO Francis, To the Inscriptions of Labraunda.
